mapper.select: select row_number() over(order by member_UserYN,member_Join_Date) as NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_ZIPCODE, MEMBER_ADDRESS, MEMBER_ADDRESS2, MEMBER_NEWZIPCODE, MEMBER_NEWADDRESS, MEMBER_NEWADDRESS2, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_TEL, MEMBER_ANIMAL_TYPE, MEMBER_REQUESTS, MEMBER_USERYN, MEMBER_ADMIN, MEMBER_JOIN_DATE, MEMBER_DEL_DATE from Pet_Member order by member_UserYN, member_Join_Date
select * from Pet_Member where member_ID = '${MEMBER_ID}' order by member_Join_Date
select count(*) as count from Pet_Member where member_ID = '${MEMBER_ID}' and member_PW = '${MEMBER_PW}'
select * from Pet_Member where member_ID = '${MEMBER_ID}' and member_PW = '${MEMBER_PW}'
